divs: sighting detailswhile getting ready for bed at approximately 3am, i happened to look out the window towards the connerville are or more particularly nearly due west. at that point, i noticed a peculiar rotating light which was somewhat oval in nature. it rotated counter clockwise in multiple colors, including blue, purple, red, orange and was seemingly segmented. this rotating light also made rather erratic motions and flashed a very bright, white light. using an imaginary plane, it made sine\cosine maneuvers as well as vertical maneuvers. this lasted for about 20 minutes. however, i did take into account, satellites and the planet mercury, due to the reddish color. after watching for said 20 minutes or so, it flashed extremely bright, shot up and disappeared. the same thing happened at about the same time on 30 june at about 3am, however, it was a little closer. one could clearly discern the segmented lights that rotated and flashed. insofar as the altitude is concerned, i would estimate between 30,000-50,000 agl and it was approximately 30 degrees above the horizon, but further away than connersville, therefore, i am just using connersville as the nearest city reference. the only thing behind me directly, is a farm. at the time this occurred, admittedly, i felt a sense of wonderment, however, for a brief second or so, felt a sense of near terror. then thought it was pretty cool. the night was clear and comfortable.
Summary: orange, red, blue, flash of white light
